name: Hardest 1.19 "Pick a Con...Any Con" Trivia Quiz | 'Cheers'- Season 1 | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Reid Shelton.

	Reid Shelton was born October 7, 1924. He died in 1997 at the age of 72.

questions.text: How many games had Coach won?
questions.explanation:
0.

	Coach thought that the games were all just in fun. He didn't realize he was been scammed.

questions.text: How much money had Coach lost?
questions.explanation:
$8000.

	When Coach told Sam it was just fun, Sam asked him "How much fun have you lost?" George was a con artist and easily fooled Coach into thinking it was just a friendly game of cards.

questions.text: Who did they call to help Coach win back his money?
questions.explanation:
Harry.

	Harry was played by Harry Anderson. He, himself, was a great con artist so he knew how to con George.

questions.text: Who got to watch the bar when Sam was busy?
questions.explanation:
Diane.

	At first he said Carla should watch the bar but Diane was upset about this because Carla always got to watch the bar. Sam then said Diane would watch the bar which made Diane happy.

questions.text: What drink did Diane try to make?
questions.explanation:
Bloody Mary.

	Carla waited a long time for Diane to make a Bloody Mary. Diane told Sam there was a lot of ingredients in a Bloody Mary to which Sam replied, "That's why we keep some made in the refrigerator."

questions.text: What game did Harry have Coach challenge George in?
questions.explanation:
Poker.

	Harry said that George was not very good at poker. However, he also knew that George wouldn't turn down a chance to beat Coach out of more money.

George.

	The people in the bar were upset with Harry because it was supposed to be a sure thing that George wouldn't win at poker. Little did they know that Harry had a plan.

questions.text: What was the signal Coach was to give George when Harry couldn't beat three queens?
questions.explanation:
Coach would rub his nose.

	Coach's nose started itching so he itched it. George thought it was the signal even though Coach told him his nose itched.

questions.text: Who won the game between George and Harry?
questions.explanation:
Harry.

	George got mad at Coach for screwing up the game. Everyone thought George and Harry were in on a scam together when in reality it was Coach and Harry that were in on a scam to get back at George.
